name: Emotional Resonance
desc: When feeding, absorb fragments of emotion; use or manipulate for subtle influence. (+1 to Mental or Perception rolls to influence)

name: Unnatural Beauty
desc: Gifted with unnatural beauty; mortals and supernaturals stare in awe or dread. (+3 Mental in Social Situations or use of Mental Powers)

name: Unyielding Will
desc: Mind-influencing powers (fear, charms, compulsions) find it harder to affect you. (-2 to Attackers' Roll)

name: Shadow's Veil
desc: Blend into darkness comes easy; (+1 to Stealth Rolls)

name: Ancient Wisdom
desc: You speak one additional language and can decipher arcane text. Grants a single starting school of Magic.

name: Neural Disruptive Vitae
desc: Your blood acts as a short-lived poison, disabling cybernetic linkages temporarily.

name: Predator's Cunning
desc: Sense violence before it happens; seize the initiative (Go first).

name: Pulse of the Ark
desc: Sense clusters of humanity/life across the Ark's levels. Helps guide your hunt.

name: Blood Economy
desc: Store blood/Chi more efficiently, reducing need to feed and enhancing resource management.

name: Cybernetic Adaptation
desc: Your nature entwines seamlessly with cybernetics, allowing implants and augmentations to shift with your essence.

name: Emotional Resonance
desc: When feeding, absorb fragments of emotion; use or manipulate for subtle influence. (+1 to Mental or Perception rolls to influence)

desc: Gifted with unnatural beauty; mortals and supernaturals stare in awe or dread. (+3 Mental in Social Situations or use of Mental Powers)

name: Unyielding Will
desc: Mind-influencing powers (fear, charms, compulsions) find it harder to affect you. (-2 to Attackers' Roll)

name: Shadow's Veil
desc: Blend into darkness comes easy; (+1 to Stealth Rolls)

name: Ancient Wisdom
desc: You speak one additional language and can decipher arcane text. Grants a single starting school of Magic.

name: Neural Disruptive Vitae
desc: Your blood acts as a short-lived poison, disabling cybernetic linkages temporarily.

name: Predator's Cunning
desc: Sense violence before it happens; seize the initiative (Go first).

name: Pulse of the Ark
desc: Sense clusters of humanity/life across the Ark's levels. Helps guide your hunt.

name: Blood Economy
desc: Store blood/Chi more efficiently, reducing need to feed and enhancing resource management.

name: Cybernetic Adaptation
desc: Your nature entwines seamlessly with cybernetics, allowing implants and augmentations to shift with your essence.

name: SSL & HSL
desc: Learn Beast and Hybrid Shifter Sign Languages. Communicate silently with other Spliced in shifted forms.

name: Designer's Gift
desc: Thrive in hostile environments; +2 Physical or Mental rolls vs hazards. Immune to suffocation/temperature penalties.

name: Mate Bond
desc: Supernatural/genetic bond with Spliced or human mate. Telepathic/empathic comms; +1 Mental rolls when coordinating.

name: Maximized Shift
desc: One shifted form is much larger; +2 Physical in that form at creation. Permanent.

name: Unnatural Weapons (Chimerical Only)
desc: Manifest two melee weapon equivalents in shifted forms. Attacks deal flat damage (Light/Medium/Heavy). Chimeric only.

name: Adaptive Biology
desc: Resistant to toxins and hostile environments; resistant to non-magical poisons/diseases.

name: Cybernetic Adaptation
desc: Cybernetic limbs/implants function across all forms; prosthetics retain stats/damage in Hybrid/Chimerical; all combat powers compatible.

name: Bioelectric Resonance
desc: Sense/manipulate bioelectric currents; +2 Mental rolls when sensing/manipulating electronics; emit shock (6+Mental) once/scene.

name: Pulse Sense
desc: Feel the heartbeat of the Ark; sense imbalance, danger, or hidden movement.

name: Echo Imprint
desc: Leave a lingering trace (sound, scent, flicker) in a space, triggers later like a haunting memory.

name: Emotional Reading
desc: Intuitively sense emotional states.

name: Veil-Touched Aura
desc: Faint supernatural gravitas. Bonus on first impressions/social rolls with mortals.

name: Veil-Touched Presence
desc: Reality bends slightly; advantage on charm, deception, performance with mortals.

name: Circuit Sympathy
desc: Intuitively sense/influence minor tech systems: lights, doors, temp, controls.

name: Memory Echo
desc: Sense residual emotions/events imprinted in places, objects, or systems.

name: Unnatural Composure
desc: Resist fear/intimidation/chaos. Bonuses vs fear, social coercion, panic.

name: Illusion Drift
desc: Passive glamours alter appearance based on mood/intent; harder to track unless confronted.

name: Veil's Favor
desc: Once/session, reroll a failed check as if guided by unseen hands.

name: Ancient Wisdom
desc: Gleaned ancient secrets; speak one additional language, decipher arcane text; grants starting school of Magic.

name: Phantom Walk
desc: Once/scene, roll to slip partly into the Veil, bypassing barriers or avoiding harm briefly.

name: Adaptive Instinct
desc: Gain +1 to any single Stat roll (Physical, Dex, or Mental) when adjusting to new environments, systems, or social structures.

name: Survival Drive
desc: +2 HP for scene or +1 to Physical/Mental save in hostile/extreme situations.

name: Alliance Builder
desc: +1 to Social/Mental rolls when forming bonds, negotiating, or influencing other factions/gifted beings.

name: Augment Access
desc: Gain 2 free slots in a cybernetic prosthetic and 1 (2pt) augment. Can use more points for higher level augments.

name: Artifact Resonance
desc: Near ancient Earth artifacts or magical relics, gain +2 Mental rolls/insight checks for one scene.

name: Magiventive
desc: (Synthral only) Access 2 extra Magitech blueprints for crafting/effect.

name: Spell Coding
desc: (Synthral only) Can program a cyber sprite to cast a single spell once/scene.

name: Symbolic Literacy
desc: (Arcanist only) +2 Mental rolls for deciphering glyphs, runes, or magical symbols.

name: Cognitive Shielding
desc: (Psion only) Resistance to manipulation, illusions, or emotional coercion. TN increased by 2 for any such effect.
